Generation IX.Scarlet: Tadbulb shakes its tail to generate electricity. If it senses danger, it will make its head blink on and off to alert its allies.
Generation IX.Violet: It floats using the electricity stored in its body. When thunderclouds are around, Tadbulb will float higher off the ground.
